content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith

content: Hello, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I would like to discuss the rental price with you. Is there a specific amount you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I was thinking 500 Euros per month. Is that reasonable?
name: Mary Smith

content: I appreciate your offer, but I would like to suggest a higher rental price for the apartment. I understand that we are both looking to maximize our gains, but based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe a price of 700 Euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Okay, I can understand that. How about 650 Euros per month?

[I want to negotiate the price, so I will say: "I agree to 650 Euros per month."]

I agree to 650 Euros per month.
name: Mary Smith

content: I am pleased to hear that you are willing to accept 650 Euros per month for the rental of the apartment. I believe this is a fair price for the size and location of the property. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
